ComicInfo.Summary: While the rest of the Femforce work disaster relief for the thousands of victims of the just-passed Hurricane Andrew, Synn searches the Limbo Void for a sign of the missing Nightveil. When the huuricane winds reach even the goat god Capricorn's realm, the quick-thinking Alizarin Crimson blames Nightveil, and enraged Capricorn soon hatches a plot to have revenge on NV, and all humans. And as a Cloak-Of-Darkness bereft Nightveil (it was carried away on the hurricane's winds) wanders among the homeless refugees, Synn thinks back on her first enconters with 'Crimson. The Capricorn Chronicles, Book One: "Red Rage", is written by Bill Black, drawn by Black, Brad Gorby and Mark Heike, and inked by Heike and John Beatty. Cameos by Buckaroo Betty and The Avenger, this is one part of a three-part epic that was later collected into a trade paperback graphic novel, titled "Capricorn Chronicles".This book has a color cover by Mark Heike,and interiors that are black and white with graytones. Standard comic book format.
ComicInfo.Title: The Capricorn Chronicles Book One: Red Rage
